00013 void MyVer(char *msg)
00014 {
00015     fprintf(stderr,"Verbose [%s]\n",msg);
00016 }

00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct List *list, *cell;
00028  
00029     adfEnvInitDefault();
00030 
00031 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00032 
00033     /* mount existing device */
00034     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1],FALSE );
00035     if (!hd) {
00036         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00037         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00038     }
00039 
00040     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00041     if (!vol) {
00042         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00043         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00044         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00045     }
00046 
00047     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00048 
00049     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00050     while(cell) {
00051         printEntry(cell->content);
00052         cell = cell->next;
00053     }
00054     adfFreeDirList(list);
00055 
00056     putchar('\n');
00057 
00058     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_1a");
00059 
00060     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00061     while(cell) {
00062         printEntry(cell->content);
00063         cell = cell->next;
00064     }
00065     adfFreeDirList(list);
00066 
00067     putchar('\n');
00068 
00069     /* same hash than dir_1a" */
00070     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00071 
00072     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00073     while(cell) {
00074         printEntry(cell->content);
00075         cell = cell->next;
00076     }
00077     adfFreeDirList(list);
00078 
00079     putchar('\n');
00080 
00081     adfUnMount(vol);
00082     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00083 
00084 
00085     adfEnvCleanUp();
00086 
00087     return 0;
00088 }
